      • putPrizes

        @Transactional
public void putPrizes​(List<Map<String,​Object>> prizes)
        Put prizes if (prizeRepository.count() == 0)

        For ApplicationConfig.setPrizes(java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>>)

        JSON configuration is in classpath:/prize-${spring.profiles.active}.json (for example in /usr/share/tomcat/webapps/tombola/WEB-INF/classes/prize-production.json) This is reading with JsonFactory.

        Parameters:
        prizes - List<Map<String,Object>>
